name: dom-node-template
description: create usefull html node wrapper object with es6 template string.

scripts.build: clear; npm run --silent clean:dir && babel ./src --out-dir ./build && npm run --silent sound:microwave
scripts.test: clear; npm run --silent build && ./bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register && npm run --silent sound:plock
scripts.test:monitor: nodemon -x "rm -rf ./build; babel ./src --out-dir ./build && ./bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register && npm run --silent sound:plock"

author: Dennis Weiersh√§user <dennis.weiershaeuser@l3p-cv.com>
